actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-185, by Mr. Sessions.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 71.

official_title: Providing for pro forma sessions during the summer district work period.

summary.text: Provides that when the House of Representatives adjourns on August 2 or 3, 2001, and on each of its successive days of meetings under this order, it stand adjourned until noon on each third successive day until September 5, 2001, unless the House receives a message from the Senate transmitting its adoption of a concurrent resolution providing for the summer district work period.

titles.title: Providing for pro forma sessions during the summer district work period.
